title: Startup Founders Podcast Episode 14 â€“ Rui Ma, 500 Startups Venture Partner, China
content:
This week, I sit down to speak with another member of the 500 team! Rui Ma (first name pronounced "ray") is based in Beijing, but has spent the last few weeks in the Bay Area. In this episode, she reveals Chinese venture capital and tech trends. Please remember to send questions to me @markjsaldana on Twitter and leave us a review on iTunes. Listen now:
iTunes Stitcher RSS Feed If you're a founder at a kickass startup, don't forget to apply for Batch 007. Thanks for listening, and tune in next week for another episode!
